feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX][VMware Private Cloud] - Datastore maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 11, 07:00 UTC  -  Aug 21, 16:00 UTC

Jul 11, 09:01 UTC
Update - This maintenance has been re-scheduled.
Below you can find new information regarding the operation.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 11/08/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 21/08/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : You may experience a micro cut if the customer is writing a lot on their datastore.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on multiple storage servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

Jul 2, 04:23 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 15/07/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 17/07/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : You may experience a micro cut if the customer is writing a lot on their datastore.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on multiple storage servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - vSphere maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 4, 07:00 UTC  -  Aug 7, 16:00 UTC

Jul 9, 23:18 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 04/08/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 07/08/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : During the maintenance, vSphere won't be accessible and hosts will be put in maintenance mode for 1 hour.
vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our vSphere offer.
An individual communication will be done to inform customers.
Customers can reschedule the operation through the manager.

Thank you for your understanding

entry.title: [SBG2A][Managed vSphere] - Equipment update notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 21, 11:30 - 21:00 UTC

Jun 24, 20:28 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer.

Start time : 21/07/2025 11:30 UTC
End time : 21/07/2025 21:00 UTC
Service impact : During the operation, customers may experience a few seconds of slowness when reading from or writing to their datastore.
However, there will be no impact on the vSphere UI, data availability or virtual machines.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for multiple storage servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX8][Managed vSphere] - Rack R832B14 incident notification
entry.content:
Jul 13, 22:40 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our VMware Private Cloud offering has been resolved.

Start time : 13/07/2025 20:42 UTC
End time : 13/07/2025 22:35 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jul 13, 20:42 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Managed VMware Cloud Director offer on the specific rack R832B14 in RBX8.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 13/07/2025 20:01 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some hosts are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Some customers are temporarily unable to access their hosts located on the specified rack.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jul 13, 20:26 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our VMware Private Cloud offering, which is causing temporary availability issues in the rack R832B14 in RBX8.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 13/07/2025 20:01 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some hosts are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Some customers are temporarily unable to access their hosts located on the specified rack.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [ERI1C][Hosted Private Cloud] - Migration Zpool
entry.content:
Jul 11, 17:08 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jul 7, 07:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 10, 21:51 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 07/07/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 11/07/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : You may experience a micro cut if the customer is writing a lot on the zpool.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams will perform filer transfers.

Thank you for your understanding.
